DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain subjective feedback home use environment regard usability ease use applicator conception cap instruction use . Data collect evaluation determine usability requirement conception system determine usability specification meet . The study involve sexual intercourse delivery fluid cervix . The study involve use applicator insert cervical cap vagina , track cervix prepare release cervical cap ( removal string attach ) onto cervix . The conception cap remain place 6 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Human Factors Usability Study Ib2C Conception System

Data collect evaluation determine usability requirement conception system determine usability specification meet . The study involve sexual intercourse delivery fluid cervix . The study involve use applicator insert cervical cap vagina , track cervix prepare release cervical cap ( removal string attach ) onto cervix . The conception cap remain place 6 hour .
DOC.criteria: Female , ethnicity 20 45 year age Sexually active Signed Informed Consent Prior surgery cervix vaginal tract Vaginal prolapse Cervical cancer Hysterectomy History Toxic Shock Syndrome ( TSS )
